sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.store

Interface PropertyLoader

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CashPropertyLoader, DrinkPropertyLoader, FilePropertyLoader

    public interface PropertyLoader
    This interface provides the generic functionality required to initialize the stores.
    Version:
    3.0 5/07/2003
    Author:
    Olivo Miotto, Pang Ping Li
    See Also:
    CashStore, CashStoreItem, Coin, DrinksBrand, DrinksStore, DrinksStoreItem, Store, StoreController, StoreItem, StoreObject

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      StoreItem getItem(int index)
      This method reads the data from the hash table and creates a StoreItem.
      int getNumOfItems()
      This method returns the number of items (either CashStoreItem or DrinkStoreItem) stored in the hash table.
      void initialize()
      This method reads the properties file into a hash table.
      void saveProperty()
      This method writes the properties from the hash table to the file.
      void setItem(int index, StoreItem item)
      This method updates the hash table with the data from the StoreItem.
      void setNumOfItems(int numItems)
      This method sets the number of items (either CashStoreItem or DrinkStoreItem) stored in the hash table.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        void initialize()
         throws java.io.IOException
        This method reads the properties file into a hash table.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if fail to read properties from properties file.

      • saveProperty

        void saveProperty()
           throws java.io.IOException
        This method writes the properties from the hash table to the file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if fail to save properties to properties file.

      • getNumOfItems

        int getNumOfItems()
        This method returns the number of items (either CashStoreItem or DrinkStoreItem) stored in the hash table.
        Returns:
        the number of items.

      • setNumOfItems

        void setNumOfItems(int numItems)
        This method sets the number of items (either CashStoreItem or DrinkStoreItem) stored in the hash table.
        Parameters:
        numItems - the number of items.

      • getItem

        StoreItem getItem(int index)
        This method reads the data from the hash table and creates a StoreItem.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the store item.
        Returns:
        StoreItem the store item of the given index.

      • setItem

        void setItem(int index,
             StoreItem item)
        This method updates the hash table with the data from the StoreItem.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the item.
        item - the item to be saved.
